attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Gordon Brown 

Whats happened to the Nations Glory?
We are a laughting stock to other countrys ?
We are the worlds leaders in everything we have done, Bussiness - you guys - Armed Force's, Health Care , we are the worlds Hospital , Sir we acepect you as a Nations leader dont listen to all that take the piss, You are in power Because you are a world Leader, When we see you on TV you dont look confidened within your self, wheres that Mr Brown that used to smile? Please please put England Right, A country needs its Leader to solve and address the nation that Labour is a colour that is bright and clear to all, i hope to have a responce to my letter, what would churchhill do if he were here today ? i have no Petition just want Englands Glorie back andthe pride to fly our flag up high and to have an PM that is a PM . have a good day Sir and all the best that what ever you do ....

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
